channel.title: Evernote on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in Evernote on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: Switching from Evernote to DEVONtechnologies products
item.description: I’ve used Evernote since 2014, with over 3k notes of all kinds stored in it. Though I did try to capture everything of interest - the procedure was never fast or streamlined enough for me. The Evernote app runs ridiculously slower on older phones. In particular, being used to the speed of Emacs and Org-mode - I was mostly displeased with the Evernote Mac / Windows apps as well. I ended up using the drafts app for writing on iOS devices.
